availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Johnson County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Lydia Chapman Crum in Lawrence County, Kentucky, on February 17, 1859. Father of John Crum. Farmer in Johnson County in 1860. Appointed justice of the peace in Johnson County on March 2, 1861.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States(1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Johnson County, p. 40.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Lawrence County Marriages, Film #000840550, pp. 24-25.
KYR-0001-017-0090.
